abstract: Jordanian security officials release uncle of Mohammod Abdelazeez, gunman who killed five servicemen in Chattanooga, Tenn.
lead_paragraph: Jordanian security services released the uncle of the gunman who killed five servicemen in Chattanooga, Tenn., last week without charge, a family representative said.

headline.main: Jordan Authorities Free Uncle of Chattanooga Gunman
headline.print_headline: Authorities in Jordan Free Uncle of Gunman

snippet: Jordanian security services released the uncle of the gunman who killed five servicemen in Chattanooga, Tenn., last week without charge, a family representative said.
